text: Ara madiyanabasidera [1] kache tadera bha'i su’a'ibake pathiyechilama [2]. Tini balechilena, ‘he amara sampradaya! Tomara allahara ibadata kara, tini chara tomadera an'ya kono satya ilah ne'i, ara mape o ojane kama karo na; niscaya'i ami tomaderake kalyanera madhye dekhachi [3], kintu ami tomadera upara asanka karachi eka sarbagrasi dinera sasti
